about_the_game:
Growing vegetables, raising pigs, opening factories; getting married, buying a house, having a baby.

In this game, you will play a character created by yourself, with the freedom to decide their personality, appearance, age, and more. (don't want to decide by yourself, in fact, you can ~). You can cultivate wasteland and sow seeds, you can raise pigs, build factories and run businesses, you can have children with your loved ones (it doesn't matter if you die alone). And the NPCS in the game world will have a full life, ready to experience a different life?
The in-game world is divided into six regions, each with unique geography and climate conditions, and you will build your own empire from scratch.

There are dozens of crops that can be grown in the game. Modern farms are divided into poultry and livestock, and different types of farms have different management schemes.


In addition to planting and breeding, the game also has some adventure elements, you can explore the surrounding Gobi, desert, find a superior traits of the wild plants (eyes too big, give up, this is still the small eyes of the natural advantage), and then bring back to the lab for cross-breeding, tissue culture, maybe become the Frankenstein of the plant world?


In addition, there are dozens of factories in the game as many as dozens of production lines to meet your different production needs, such as peanut oil refining can go to the oil refinery, down jacket production can go to the garment factory. If you develop as the industry leader, you can even have the pricing power of the industry's products in the entire market, which will directly affect the acceptance of peer products in the market.


Through careful cultivation and various management in the game, constantly expand their planting and breeding scale and control costs, obtain rich benefits at the same time, you can also run a business, a steady stream of talent for their own absorption, add more sources of income.


Whether it is planting, breeding or opening a factory, the product will eventually be circulated to the market, and there is a perfect supply and demand system in the game, and the price of the product will fluctuate with the change of the supply and demand relationship and the change of market sentiment.


In addition, the game can also establish a different relationship with other NPCS, a good relationship can make their work twice the result, if the relationship crashes, it will not only affect the mood, but also beware of a "major troublemaker" to become a stumbling block on your development road. What do you ask me? Hey, young man, all I can say is "Beat magic with magic". Welcome to try out the card play we built. Not only is it a powerful tool for you to defeat magic, but it can also help you get better offers in rental, real estate transactions, supply purchase negotiations, oversupply supply and so on.

Although running farms, factories, livestock farms and enterprises at the same time can seem overwhelming, the goose down in your clothing factory can come from the geese in your farm, and the feed for the geese can be your own feed mill, and the raw materials for the feed mill need your farm, so that each link is linked to your industrial chain to form a closed loop. It will greatly reduce costs and increase efficiency, and you only need to plan behind the scenes to achieve a whole grand business map!



Finally, "The Era of Pioneers" is a casual game that simulates farming operations and is suitable for players of all ages. Whether you want to experience the fun of farming under the South Mountain, or standing on the top of the mountain and looking into the distance, "The Era of Pioneers" will meet your expectations. Join us and start a different life!
